ygData.subject: Re: High Pass Hold
ygData.msgSnippet: MAn Im in the same situation as you  Idied twuce in HIghholdpass..Its scary ... From: MFerrulo@aol.com  To: EverQuest@onelist.com
ygData.messageBody:
MAn Im in the same situation as you Idied twuce in HIghholdpass..Its scary
-----Original Message-----
From: MFerrulo@... <MFerrulo@...>
To: EverQuest@onelist.com <EverQuest@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, April 26, 1999 10:01 AM
Subject: [EverQuest] High Pass Hold


>From: MFerrulo@...
>
>
>Ok, I''m a 9th Level Barbarian Warrior and last night I decided to make the
>treacherous run from Queynos to Freeport. I got as far as High Pass Hold
>when I was waylaid and killed by a gnoll soothsayer. I retrieved my corpse
>and then spent an hour running around trying to find the way out of High
Pass
>Hold towards Freeport. IT WAS SO FRUSTRATING!!! It was also scary as hell
>seeing how I was practically naked and the only player character in the
>entire zone.
>
>Could someone please give me some advice or direction in how to get the
hell
>out of High Pass Hold and through to Freeport?
>
>McBanus of Halas
>
>
